findings.message:
LUSDToken.permit(address,address,uint256,uint256,uint8,bytes32,bytes32) (LUSDToken.sol#2356-2378) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(deadline == 0 || deadline >= now,LUSD: Signature has expired) (LUSDToken.sol#2369)
findings.name: timestamp
